name: The Sickly Sweets Take Back The Mall
name_original: The Sickly Sweets Take Back The Mall
description:
A demo for the Candy Friday Jam 2021. You control the three members of a rebellious girl gang in the local Candyland Mall. Take down the (currently only two) henchman and (eventually) pave the way to a final confrontation with a rival gang and take back the mall! Playable with mouse, and keyboard for battles. Hit the X key to bring up the menu to save or eat snacks.

Music by Aaron Krogh - https://soundcloud.com/aaron-anderson-11

Sprites and backgrounds by myself, Violet D. Kerrigan.
